description: Construction of  loft conversion and 2 rear dormers following the demolition of existing roof.
decision_conditions: The proposed development, by reason of its alteration of the front roof slope and over-extension of the side roof slope, would be unsympathetic to the building and conservation area and not respect the character, context, and appropriate capacity for growth. As such, the proposal would not satisfy The London Plan (2021) policies D1, D3, D4, and HC1 and Development Management: Development Plan Document (2013) Local Plan Policies 7.4 and 7C. | The proposed development, by reason of its undersized bedrooms, reduced floor to ceiling heights, and small windows in relation to habitable spaces, would not be accessible, inclusive, and a high-quality living experience and provide would fail to provide good levels of daylight and sunlight. As such, the proposal would not satisfy The London Plan (2021) policies D5 and D6 and Development Management: Development Plan Document (2013) Local Plan Policies 3.5, and 7B.
